1126040.name: Volhv: Memoir of the Witch Doctor
1126040.description:
Enough of the concrete jungle! It's time to get back to the roots.
    They say "Jobs fill your pockets, but adventures fill your soul.”
    Drop everything and find your own, through delving into the magical world of Volkhv!
    Navigate through untouched lands, seeking ingredients for your potions - but be aware, your pouch is not a bottomless one!
    Miss one of the ingredients and your hours-long ritual goes to hell!



    Mandrake seed - check, cauldron cleaned - everything is ready, it's time to begin the rituals. Stay focused!
    Every dash of dried herbs, every drop of a deadly venom can turn a love potion into a mixture that
    changes your client into a chicken or sends him home in a box.
    On a side note: you probably shouldn't test your concoctions on a chieftain of the nearby village -
    you might find yourself on the wrong side of the grass for that.





    You still need to pay in order to put food on the table, but luckily the people lining up in front of your hut are willing to toss a coin to their Volkhv!
    Choose wisely, as you cannot afford to help them all. Save up on your ingredients, while keeping a good income.
    At the end of the day, resource management is a fundamental of alchemy!





    The night brings relief to the regular people
    The dawn brings a much-welcomed respite to common men, but not you.
    It's a time of satanic pacts and ravenous spirits!
    Secure your hut to keep the evil forces away, or get into a trade with the master of darkness.
    Firstly though, make sure you can afford to pay the price, which is never a low one!
1126040.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 波兰语, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
